mapper.select: select * from book where category in (select id from book_category where parent_id=#{category_id}) ;
select book_id,chapter_id,price from book_chapter where book_id=#{bookId};
select book_id,chapter_id,price,content from book_chapter where book_id=#{book_id} and chapter_id=#{chapter_id} limit 1;

SELECT c.chapter_id,c.price, case when (r.user_id is null and c.price>0) then true else false end as "lock" FROM book_chapter c left join (select * from buy_record where user_id=#{user_id}) r on c.chapter_id=r.chapter_id and c.book_id=r.book_id where c.book_id=#{book_id};
select * from book where id=#{book_id} limit 1;
